1.name: Bed
1.notes: Comes with box spring, metal legs. Pick up would be on the morning of 1/14.

2.name: Rug
2.notes: The best Ikea rug that money could buy

3.name: Desk
3.notes: The only place you can possibly do work. You don't want to cheap out on this one. Chair sold seperately

4.name: Desk Chair
4.notes: It's got wheels. It's got arm rests. It's got (possibly fake) leather. What else do you need?

6.name: Computer Monitor
6.notes: I use it mainly to watch movies and TV shows. Sometimes porn.

7.name: Speakers
7.notes: The audio jack is a little messed up. Should be cheap to replace. Comes with subwoofer.

8.name: Silver Lamp
8.notes: The tall silver lamp in the living room. It bends, it sheds light, it has positive chi.

9.name: Camping Chair
9.notes: Not very comfortable, but it folds and camps.

11.name: Toaster
11.notes: There's no better way to toast bread.

12.name: Toaster oven
12.notes: Kind of like the toaster, but in oven form.

13.name: Microwave
13.notes: Only gives you a little bit of cancer.

14.name: Kitchen Garbage
14.notes: This thing is ergonomic as fuck. It'll even make your posture better.

15.name: White Board
15.notes: Useful sketching complicated coding diagrams, drawing calanders, and playing tic tac toe.

16.name: Ball Maze
16.notes: The awesome spherical ball maze thing. Best $10 I've ever spent at CVS. Limited release.

17.name: Polaroid Camera
17.notes: I think I paid $15 for it. Does not come with film.

18.name: Vaporizer
18.notes: For smoking tobacco. Needs a new whip, which should be cheap. It otherwise works like a dream

19.name: Ikea glass
19.notes: That flowery glass bullshit thing in my living room.

20.name: Drone
20.notes: It's a little banged up and needs a new battery, but it's a fucking drone. Don't get it stuck in a tree.

21.name: Halloween Lights
21.notes: Are you really going to wait another 10 months for halloween?

22.name: Machete
22.notes: It's not very sharp, but you can still fuck someone up with it.

23.name: Triangle table
23.notes: Bedside table. Fits anywhere. Holds your shit while you sleep.

24.name: Small Book Case
24.notes: The smaller, black book case in the bargain room. It holds books like no one's business

25.name: Nerf Gun
25.notes: Pop a cap in someone's ass. Batteries/ammo included

26.name: Iron
26.notes: Who likes wrinkly clothes? I sure don't. Fuck that. Buy an iron.

27.name: Dust Buster
27.notes: Dust bust. Charger and dust included

28.name: Tiny Xmas tree
28.notes: Christmas sucks. Buy this tree. It sucks slightly less than Christmas.

29.name: Brita Filter
29.notes: It's in my fridge. Cleanses all the arsenic that Rahm is putting in the water. Comes with a pack of filters.

30.name: Laundry Detergent
30.notes: Scent-free arm & hammer. The best shit out there.

32.name: Parabolic Mirror
32.notes: It's in rough shape, but what else are you going to use to see around the corner of your parking garage?

33.name: Canned Fish Value Pack
33.notes: Probably the best deal here. When the zombie/nuclear apocalypse comes, we're going to be trading canned fish, not currency. Seriously though, think about it. Canned fish has intrinsic value/utility as food. It's portable, durable, homogenous, divisible, and stable.

35.name: Glitter Value Pack
35.notes: Some call it "The Herpes of the craft world." Comes with small glitter packs, glitter pens, and glitter spray.

36.name: Casio keyboard
36.notes: The built-in speakers don't work. You can plug in external speakers, though. Comes with charger

37.name: Plastic drawers (3)
37.notes: Those shitty plastic drawers you keep stuff in. If you don't want to buy all three, whatever you don't want will go to next best offer.

38.name: Tower Fan
38.notes: White noise. Keeps you cool at night.

39.name: Tiny chair
39.notes: It's so fucking cute, how could you not want it?

40.name: Stool
40.notes: This thing is falling apart, but it still lets me step on it to get to higher places.

41.name: Shitty Speakers
41.notes: Speakers in the bargain room. I don't know if these actually work.

42.name: Dish drainer (2)
42.notes: Who needs a dishwasher? Drain dishes the organic way. I got two of them. One's better than the other.

44.name: Toilet paper
44.notes: Enjoy wiping your ass with 2 rolls of Scott. (I prefer to use my hand).

45.name: Deck Furniture
45.notes: I got chairs, spare bike parts, a tub, and some sort of plant.

46.name: Camelback
46.notes: This thing is pretty old and needs to be steralized. But it can be yours today for the low low price of whatever the next best offer is willing to pay for it!

47.name: Nuveen Piggy bank
47.notes: Piggy bank and all the change in it. (I don't actually know how much is inside)

48.name: Steve's soul
48.notes: I was hopping to at least get $10. Includes certificate of authenticity.

49.name: Flexy Ball
49.notes: The colorful flexing ball thing that they sell at science museums

50.name: Blackwood BBQ punchcards
50.notes: I got 10 of 'em. That's a free meal right there. Damn good one at that.
